summary: The standalone follower version of my personal character as seen in shots for cloudy eyes. She\'s made with the cbbe body that will not affect your game and your game will not affect her.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a female follower based off of my personal character to the Drunken Huntsman in Whiterun.  She\'s made with the cbbe body that will not affect your game and your game will not affect her.

Kaderin is based off of Aela the Huntress. She prefers ranged combat but is also skilled with one-handed weaponry. She levels with you starting at level five and following your progress up to level 80.

[center][b]Level 5 Exotic Ranger[/b]

Health - 90
Magicka - 50
Stamina - 70

One-Handed - 26
Two-Handed - 25
Marksman - 23
Block - 26
Smithing - 20
Sneak - 18
Heavy Armor - 15
Light Armor - 19
Pickpocket - 15
Lockpicking - 15
Alchemy - 15
Speechcraft - 20
Alteration - 15
Conjuration - 15
Destruction - 15
Illusion - 15
Restoration - 15
Enchanting - 15[/center]



[center][size=10][color=red]Installation[/color][/size][/center]

Manually copy & paste the Data folder to your Skyrim folder.
It\'s generally C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\
Make sure to activate KaderinFollower.esp and OblHair05.esm in Data files in the game launcher.


[center][size=10][color=red]Uninstallation[/color][/size][/center]

Delete these files:
Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceTint\\KaderinFollower
Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\APSkins
Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\eyes\\APeyes\\Kaderin
Data\\Oblhair\\NewSea\\13.dds
Data\\Oblhair\\NewSea\\13_n.dds
Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\characterassets\\APKaderinBody
Data\\meshes\\actors\\character\\FaceGenData\\FaceGeom\\KaderinFollower
Data\\meshes\\Oblhair\\NewSea\\Hair13
Data\\meshes\\Oblhair\\NewSea\\Hair13.tri
Data\\OblHair05.esm
Data\\KaderinFollower.esp



[center][size=10][color=red]Frequently Asked Questions[/color][/size][/center]

Q. Is Kaderin marriageable?
A. Yes.

Q. Do/change blahblahblah for me, please.
A. This is simply a follower based off of my character. I have no intentions of changing anything but am willing to tell you how to do so yourself. However, I do take suggestions for new followers.

Q. Followers\' appearances doesn\'t look like your screen shots.
A. Try manual installing rather than NMM. NMM can cause some file structuring errors.



[center][size=10][color=red]Credits[/color][/size][/center]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666/]Caliente\'s Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition[/url] by Caliente
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18110/]Hair packs of TES IV Oblivion for Female Only[/url] v05 by Radioragae, Ren and Tru3lMagic
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32986]Mature skin texture for CBBE[/url] by Maevan2
author: Arcadian Phoenix
